categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Potul Fen was a male Human who served as a officer in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the Galactic War, he was stationed at Frostwake Outpost on the planet Hoth.
Officer Potul appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Specialty Vendor for Imperial players on Hoth.
